title: Hide Prices for Logged-Out Users (B2B)
description: A B2B e-commerce site wants to hide product pricing for all users who are not logged in to a verified business account.

tasks.description: Apply a rule to the product template that checks the user's authentication status.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly configures the display logic.

tasks.description: If the user is logged out, display a 'Log in to see price' message instead of the price.
tasks.expected_outcome: The rule is correctly implemented to hide the price and show a message.

tasks.description: If the user is logged in, display the price as normal.
tasks.expected_outcome: The rule correctly shows the price for authenticated users.
